text:
Health Minister C. Vijaya Baskar on Thursday, flagged off the 108 ambulance sanctioned to Mathur in the district. He said the ambulance would cater to the emergency health care needs of residents of Mathur, Kumaramangalam and Mandaiyur and would be parked at Mathur.

Rural amenities declared open

Health Minister C. Vijaya Baskar declared open rural amenities provided at a cost of Rs. 22.60 lakh in Viralimalai block on Thursday.

The amenities included a passenger shelter constructed at an estimate of Rs. 13 lakh at Annavasal, water purifier near the Government Hospital at Iluppur at a cost of Rs. 5 lakh and auditoriums, each constructed at a cost of Rs.3.60 lakh, at Karupparkovil and the Government High School.
title: Ambulance service flagged off
